content: free video tutorial only sizes 0-3 3-6 6-12 12-24 months https //seventhsedge etsy com/listing/4403046739 the sizes correspond to a chest measurement of approximately 14 5-16 16-17 5 17 5-19 19-20 5 inches / 36-40 40-44 44-48 48-52 cm measurements chest circumference 21 5 23 26 5 28 inches / 54 58 67 71 cm length 12 13 14 15 inches / 30 33 36 38 cm sleeve length 10 5 12 13 5 15 inches / 27 31 35 39 cm gauge 11 stitches and 15 row = 4 × 4 inches / 10 × 10 cm in stockinette stitch needles u s 13 9 mm circular needles and u s 13 9 mm double-pointed needles if not using the magic loop technique or size needed to obtain gauge yarn bulky weight yarn approx 115 yds / 105 m per 100 g / 3 5 oz skein 160 190 230 270 g sample shown in k+c roving materials 4 4 5 5 0 8 in / 2 cm buttons scissors stitch markers tapestry needle measuring tape techniques cast on knit purl m1r m1l k2tog yo bind off the coat baby cardigan is the perfect sweater for both boys and girls this classic raglan is worked back and forth on long circular needles top-down with raglan increases the sleeves are worked in the round using either double-pointed needles or circular needles with the magic loop technique this pattern can be easily adjusted to your desired length this cardigan is designed to be worn with 6-10 inches / 16-25 cm of positive ease at the chest
